xwikidoc.title: #if($doc.name == 'GoalModelSheet')GoalModel Sheet#{else}$services.display.title($doc, {'displayerHint': 'default'})#end
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document. #set($object = $doc.getObject('RISCOSSPlatformModelManagerCode.GoalModelClass')) #set($class = $object.xWikiClass) #foreach($prop in $class.properties) ; $prop.prettyName #if($prop.getName() == "goalModelData") : [[attach:$object.getProperty("goalModelData").value]] #else : $doc.display($prop.getName()) #end #end ---- {{html wiki="true"}} #set($xredirect = $xwiki.getDocument("RISCOSSPlatformGoalModels.WebHome").getURL()) [[$services.localization.render("delete")>>$doc.getExternalURL("delete", "xredirect=${xredirect}")]] {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
